name: Magnus Health
description: The technology team at Magnus Health has developed a robust application programming interface (API) that facilitates interaction between your school’s information system and Magnus Health. Schools that are already using a student information system can take advantage of having a single sign-on (SSO) integration with Magnus Health’s web-based SMR (student medical record).
